attributes.action: FA should take action after Romelu Lukaku has been caught kicking Gatean Bong
attributes.additional_details: He should receive a ban to prevent any future incidents from other players similar to this. This will outline the FA as strict and serious and will help keep Football safe.
attributes.background: On the 25th Novemeber 2017, Romelu Lukaku has been caught on camera kicking Gaetan Bong (Brighton Defender) in the face. He has escaped punishment from the FA, but I would like this to be reconsidered. This escape from punishment outlines to other players that they can get away with this in future.
